title: So I was told to do bruiser Yi...
body:
{{champion:11}} {{item:1300}} {{item:1403}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} 
Unkillable, massive damage from double titanic every single hit.
21/6 4v5 Victory

Helps to Q dodge everything, too.

I feel like there's something better than bork that I can use... What could I replace it with?
